title: Zager & Evans - 3 albums - Zager & Evans - 2525 - Food for the m
description:
The folk-rock duo of guitarist/vocalists Denny Zager and Richard Evans made their bid for temporary greatness with "In the Year 2525," a post-apocalyptic vision of life in the future. 

Formed in Lincoln, NE, Zager & Evans hit number one with "In the Year 2525" less than a month after its release in summer 1969 (the single was written by Evans, allegedly in half an hour). Their only other charted song was "Mr. Turnkey" which was a minor hit that same year. 

The LPs In the Year 2525 (Exordium & Terminus) and The Early Writing of Zager & Evans followed in quick succession before the end of the year, but the pair&#039;s chart run had finished. Food for the Mind, released in 1971, proved their final LP.

Here you will find all 3 albums as vinyl rips, processed to eliminate noise.

1969 - 2525 (Exordium & Terminus)
1969 - Zager & Evans
1971 - Food for the mind

Enjoy, PLEASE COMMENT, and seed
